content: where you knitted the first two row later colour b colour c cont in rib as set for 11 11 11 13 13 13 13 13 more rnds leg 44 sts join in milk bottle b but do not break a unless you round 1 *k2b work 6 sts as given for round 1 of chart a prefer to do that you can carry the yarn across the 3 times k2b repeat from * once more 44 sts motif section to the next stripe section round 2 *k2b work 6 sts as given for round 2 of chart a using b knit 3 rnds 3 times k1b k1c repeat from * once more round 3 *k1c k1b work 6 sts as given for round 3 of chart a 3 times k2c repeat from * once more tree motif band round 4 *k2c work 6 sts as given for round 4 of chart a join in spruce c using chart a or the written 3 times k2c repeat from * once more instructions and starting at round 1 work 7 rnds of round 5 as round 4 working round 5 of chart a chart a using b and c following chart a for your size round 6 *k2b work 6 sts as given for round 6 of chart a remember to carry a with you as you knit twisting 3 times k2b repeat from * once more the yarns together at least once so that you don t end up with a long float that is not anchored round 7 as round 6 working round 7 of chart a 48 sts round 1 *k3b work 6 sts as given for round 1 of chart a 3 times k2b k1c repeat from * once more 48 sts round 2 *k1c k2b work 6 sts as given for round 2 of chart a 3 times k1b k2c repeat from * once
